title: OIDC code authorization flow misleading error in some OAuth2 configurations
body:
### Describe the bug

In OIDC code authorization flow, it is possible to reach a NullPointerException if the user-info path is empty and if it is exercised.

### Expected behavior

A nice error report maybe pointing to the documentation.

### How to Reproduce?

This is related to a non discovered OAuth2 server exercising the code authorization flow during the access token validation phase

Configuration
```
quarkus.oidc.discovery-enabled=false
quarkus.oidc.auth-server-url=[REDACTED]
quarkus.oidc.token-path=token
quarkus.oidc.authorization-path=authorize
quarkus.oidc.authentication.verify-access-token=false
quarkus.oidc.authentication.id-token-required=false #they don't provide an id token
```

Note the absence of `quarkus.oidc.user-info-path`
